name: Lupa's Day Off
description:
OVERVIEW

Lupa's Day Off is a short 3D beat-em-up where you take control of Lupa, an artist trying to have a quiet little BBQ all by himself in his backyard.

However, word quickly spreads that Lupa's having a BBQ and so all sorts of guys start showing up wanting to part take in the delicious BBQ and cold beer.

Lupa planned to have this day all to himself and no one is going to ruin that for him. Punch, kick, stab, and gamma guts these freeloaders away.

Enemies get tougher to take down as you progress.

CONTROLS

Movement = W A S D or Arrow Keys

Main Attack = J or X or Left Mouse Button

Special Attack = K or C or Right Mouse Button

Toggle Fullscreen = F

Toggle Music = M

Pause Menu = Esc
